Room.Name: Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the road between Phexton Village and Hafnia Mountain Road.
Room.LongDescription: Looking south you see one of the watch towers that used to be used as a lookout for warring trolls. North is the village of Phexton, home to a race of peaceful giants who enjoy mountain life rather than the confines of a city. Giants are not very smart, and are difficult to anger, but once they do get mad, its hard to stop them from destroying everything they see.
